TermDefinition.DefinitionText: In genetics, the likelihood that a hereditary trait or disorder present in one family member will occur again in other family members. This is distinguished from recurrence risk for cancer, which is the chance that a cancer that has been treated will recur.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "riesgo de recurrencia"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: En genética, probabilidad de que un rasgo o trastorno hereditario de un miembro de una familia se presente en otros miembros de la misma familia. Este riesgo es diferente al riesgo de recidiva de cáncer, que es la probabilidad de que reaparezca un cáncer ya tratado.
